message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's a fair deal to start.
My turn. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats away more.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a small hit from my last offer and meet you in the middle at 55/45. It's the best you'll get before inflation eats away at the value even more.
